summary: The code contains a mix of English and Chinese text, representing a sample of mixed-language strings for testing purposes. It includes phrases such as "你这dollar有问题啊" (This dollar has a problem), "版本号2.1.0alpha" (Version 2.1.0 alpha), and "mixed-content warning别说我没提醒你" (Mixed content warning, I told you not to say anything).

details.comment: The code contains a mix of English and Chinese text, representing a sample of mixed-language strings for testing purposes. It includes phrases such as "你这dollar有问题啊" (This dollar has a problem), "版本号2.1.0alpha" (Version 2.1.0 alpha), and "mixed-content warning别说我没提醒你" (Mixed content warning, I told you not to say anything).
details.content:
你这dollar有问题啊
2000万巨资！经费燃烧
版本号2.1.0alpha，但是这个premature state让人担心
Do not say a word.她睡觉了。mixed-content warning别说我没提醒你
